attributes.action: Reduce the rate of import duties on cycling and excercise goods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With growing obesity and health problems, it is vital people are allowed to buy sporting goods from outside the UK at a good price ansd obtain bikes and excercise equipment at good prices. Stinging people with a high import duty will never help solve anything.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/No-Bicycle-Duty/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
